headline: TEMPTRONIC TPO 4000A-1A21-2
description:
Thermal Inducing System With High Speed 
Two-heater Head and Pneumatic Arm Assembly    For testing components, hybrids, modules, subassemblies, 
and printed circuit boards at precise temperatures.
